00010 /** Fetch All Rooms Test Method
00011  *  @brief This method tries to test the "fetchAllRooms" method of "RoomManagement" class.
00012  *  @author Efstathios Xatzikiriakidis
00013  */
00014 void TRoomManagement::testFetchAllRooms ()
00015 {
00016   Room roomA (1, 1, 2);
00017   Room roomB (2, 1, 1);
00018   RoomManagement rm;
00019 
00020   rm.newRoom (roomA);
00021   rm.newRoom (roomB);
00022   vector<Room> rooms = rm.fetchAllRooms ();
00023 
00024   QVERIFY (rooms.size () == 2);
00025 }

00071 /** New Room Test Method
00072  *  @brief This method tries to test the "newRoom" method of "RoomManagement" class.
00073  *  @author Efstathios Xatzikiriakidis
00074  */
00075 void TRoomManagement::testNewRoom ()
00076 {
00077   int roomNumber = 5;
00078   Room temp, room (roomNumber, 1, 2);
00079   RoomManagement rm;
00080 
00081   rm.newRoom (room);
00082   temp = rm.fetchRoom (roomNumber);
00083 
00084   QVERIFY (room.getRoomNumber () == temp.getRoomNumber () &&
00085            room.getRoomFloor ()  == temp.getRoomFloor ()  &&
00086            room.getCapacity ()   == temp.getCapacity ());
00087 }
00088

00107 /** Delete Room Test Method
00108  *  @brief This method tries to test the "deleteRoom" method of "RoomManagement" class.
00109  *  @author Efstathios Xatzikiriakidis
00110  */
00111 void TRoomManagement::testDeleteRoom ()
00112 {
00113   int roomNumber = 5;
00114   Room room, temp;
00115   RoomManagement rm;
00116 
00117   room.setRoomNumber (roomNumber);
00118   rm.deleteRoom (room);
00119   temp = rm.fetchRoom (roomNumber);
00120 
00121   QVERIFY (room.getRoomNumber () != temp.getRoomNumber ());
00122 }

00158  *  @brief This method tries to test the "checkInData" method of "RoomManagement" class.
00159  *  @author Efstathios Xatzikiriakidis
00160  */
00161 void TRoomManagement::testCheckInData ()
00162 {
00163   int error = 0;
00164   Room room;
00165   RoomManagement rm;
00166 
00167   room.setRoomNumber (error);
00168   room.setRoomFloor (error);

00170 
00171   QVERIFY (rm.checkInData (room) == false);
